verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Jehovah Aburuwe
Jehovah gbogbonise
Jehovah tomorrow
Jehovah talk and do
Jehovah Rapha
Jehovah Jireh
Jehovahhhhhhhh

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For the things You do...
For my life You change...
For Your mercies and glory
For the blessings You gave...
Oh repete

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Jehovah doer do me well o Papa
He do me well oh (yeh yeh)
Jehovah giver give me well o Papa
He give me well oh
God of settlement, have settle me well oh Papa
He settle well oh (yeh yeh)
Jehovah talk and do, do me well oh Papa
He do me well oh

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
See what You've made with my life...
See what You've made out of me.
See what You've turned me to be...
Your word beautify me... Lord yeh

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
The way You dey bless me
Just dey sweet my belly
The things You dey do me...
Just dey make me happy...

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
For the things You do...
For my life You change...
For Your mercies and glory
For the blessings You gave...
Oh repete
